audio_sermons.title: (Exodus) Exodus 15:1-3
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
J. Vernon McGee (1904 - 1988)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker J. Vernon McGee in mp3 format. Brother McGee pastored an inter-denominational church, Church Of The Open Door in California. In 1967 he started the now famous "Through The Bible" radio program that airs on thousands of stations world-wide.

His burden has been to do systematic simple bible teaching to equip believers, protect them against false doctrines and share the whole counsel of God. He also has been a guest lecturer at the Dallas Theological Seminary.

audio_sermons.title: (Youth Bible School 2007) A Holy Nation
audio_sermons.description: Are you a patriot? Are you willing to give your life for your nation? Which one? Really, there's only two choices. God's holy nation, made up of the followers of King Jesus, and the kingdom of this world.
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
Dean Taylor ( Â– Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Dean Taylor in mp3 format. Dean Taylor is the general editor of The Remnant of the Charity church movement. He has written a powerful book on non-resistance: A Change of Allegiance. His teachings on suffering and martyrdom are important for the body of Christ and we must learn again from our forefathers and how they suffered for Christ.
"Every day IÂ’m more convinced that the only thing worth putting my life into is the simple, child-like acceptance of the teachings of Jesus. I believe that Jesus meant what He said. But even more, I believe that JesusÂ’ plan for humanity is actually a great idea! Sometimes the ways and wisdom of Jesus donÂ’t make sense." - Dean Taylor

audio_sermons.title: Christ Made Perfect
audio_sermons.description: Major Thomas ask the question, “What saves us, Christ’s death or life?” Very understandable explanations of salvation, justification, sanctification and reconciliation . We are trying to show the world what the church can do for Christ…instead of what Christ can do through the church.
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
Major Ian Thomas (1914 – 2007)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Major Ian Thomas in mp3 format. Evangelical writer, theological teacher and founder of the Torchbearers bible schools. These schools are now world-wide in many countries and provide a teaching base on the person of Christ in the believer and basic Biblical exposition of Bible books.

Among the many books that he wrote, the most influential have been: "The Saving Life Of Christ" , "The mystery of godliness" and "If I perish, I Perish." His burden in ministry was to express and show the indwelling life of Christ in believers and the rest and power that life will have in us as we trust and have faith.

audio_sermons.title: Desert Survival Series Pt 20- Moses The Servant of God
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
Don Courville ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Don Courville in mp3 format. Brother Don has been involved in the work of revival for many years. He was involved in the Nebraska revival in the 1980's and had a radio program that aired in the mid-western United States. He has been involved in church plants and works of the Lord where great unity of faith was expressed.
Currently he is pastoring the Maranatha Baptist Church in Missouri and running a annual Family Camp where Keith Daniel is the keynote speaker. He also arranges Keith Daniels annual tour of the USA. Brother Don has been a moderator for many SermonIndex Revival Conferences across the world and has a great heart for genuine revival in our day.

audio_sermons.title: Divine Healing
audio_sermons.description: â€œFaith cometh by hearing the word of God,â€ and God will always meet faith.  And what is faith?  Why, thatâ€™s the question: what is faith?  â€œI have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.â€  Iâ€™m often troubled when I pray for the sick.  Just recently I had that experience again.  I met some saintsâ€”not anybody thatâ€™s here; now, donâ€™t feel bad; Iâ€™m not pointing right at you, see: somebody elseâ€”but saints.  I was praying for the sick, and talking faith, and praying faith, and God was there.  And these saints talked unbelief. Youâ€™d be surprised how much unbelief is hanging on us.  The Bible talks about â€œthe sin that doth so easily beset us.â€  It sticks to us.  Die klebt uns an.  Grad wie die Kletten; das ist Unglaube.  Itâ€™s unbelief.  And youâ€™d be surprised what mountains of unbelief there are in the saints.  You donâ€™t find it out until the cat bites them, or a dog barks at them, or something else happens and they really have to believe God.  Why, then their faith is goneâ€”absolutely gone.
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
Hans R. Waldvogel (1893 - 1969)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Hans R. Waldvogel in mp3 format. A powerful preacher who ministered as a pentecostal minister. He did not believe in sectarian groups but rather saw the Church as a whole who have the person of Christ in them.  Brother Waldvogel gleamed from many different men of God including A.B. Simpson.

His preaching was centred around the very person of Jesus Christ and the work of the Holy Spirit. He spoke much of the rest of the Lord in Christian work and experience and the Spirit-filled life.

audio_sermons.title: Jehovah Raphi-The Lord that Heals
audio_sermons.description: The names of God are actually parts of his divine nature, revealed to his children in their times of crisis. When Israel came to the Wilderness of Shur 3 days after crossing the Red Sea, they were thirsty, having used up their water, and immediately began to complain. God supplied the water, but Moses named the place "Marah" meaning bitterness. There are those of God's people who have been hurt and have the root of bitterness in them and God wants to lovingly deal with and remove it lest they be defiled by it. The Lord who heals can mend your broken heart. Part 2 of 8
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
David Wilkerson (1931 – 2011)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker David Wilkerson in mp3 format. Founder of Times Square Church in New York City with over 100 different languages spoken in the congregation. Wilkerson wrote many powerful books such as: The Vision and Cross and the Switchblade. His ministry was prophetic as God called him to be a watchman to the Church in North America. He gave clear messages on repentance to the Church. 

Wilkerson also founded Teen Challenge where there are hundreds of centres for Christ-centered drug recovery and addiction recovery. He also organized and spoke at pastors gatherings in many countries where he gave prophetic strong messages to encourage pastors and leaders.

audio_sermons.title: Making Much Of Jesus
audio_sermons.description: How can we look above the storms of life?  It's by making much of Jesus!  Ralph Sexton preaches the greatness of Jesus and His power, His promises, His preeminence and more.  In tune with his numerous witticisms, he exhorts, "We should be looking for the Upper Taker, not the undertaker."

audio_sermons.title: The Holiness of God
audio_sermons.description: The word holy at it's very core means 'cut' or seperate, God is so far beyond what we think He is like that we cannot truelly concieve of how what He truelly is.  In christianity today we have such a small God that bares little resemblence to the high and lofty One that inhabits eternity.  The Lord said to Moses 'I am that I am' meaning that there is no-one like Him, unlike us when He looks about He see's none like Him, except for a Carpenter who walked the earth 2000 Years ago.  The essence of seperation (holiness) is not what we are seperated from but what or in this case Who, we are seperated to.  There is no point seperating ourselves from the world if we don't then seperate ourselves unto God.
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
Paul Washer (1961 - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Paul Washer in mp3 format. Brother Washer is the founder of Heart Cry Missionary society that funds and supports indigenous missionaries all across the world. He served as a missionary personally in Peru for many years. He has a passion for the glory of God and the preaching of the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

Well-known on the internet for the audio and video message: "Shocking Message to Youth" he has been an in-demand speaker for many conventions and gatherings. He has recently published a new book: "The Gospel's Power and Message" that is highly recommended by many.

audio_sermons.title: The Signs Of Active Faith
audio_sermons.description: This is a message on the rewards of being totally yielded to God's purposes and how he can use a surrendered vessel to liberate others. The signs are for those who yield to God, who consider it a holy commission to help the lost, seeking his kingdom. Their prayer is "thy kingdom come, thy will be done, in me as it is in heaven, Lord."
audio_sermons.preacher_description:
Carter Conlon ( - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Carter Conlon in mp3 format. Carter Conlon is the Senior Pastor of Times Square Church. David Wilkerson is the Founding Pastor of Times Square Church. God called Brother Carter to full-time ministry in Canada by faith and He has been serving the Lord with the same faith till this day. 

God has used brother Carter Conlon to preach across the world at pastors conferences and evangelism crusades. He has also recently written 2 books with the newest title: "Fear Not" in which he is strengthening the body of Christ for what is coming upon the world in the end-times.
